CustomField.description: ... describes if this property should be synchronized on the first-time sync between B2C Commerce and Service Cloud. If checked, each identified property will be synchronized regardless of all other synchronization settings. Consider this an initial one-time override over the other synchronization methods.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: ... describes if this property should be synchronized on the first-time sync between B2C Commerce and Service Cloud. If checked, each identified property will be synchronized regardless of all other synchronization settings.
CustomField.label: Seed Property on First-Time Sync
